Different terms: Would you like to give us a loan under different conditions? Contact us on the e-mail <1>finance@sdilenedomy.cz</1> or call us at +420776381312.
More info: You can find more info about our loan system and answers to frequently asked questions <1>HERE</1>.
Disclaimer: The calculation in the calculator on this website is indicative and is not an offer to conclude a contract, a promise to conclude a contract, a public offer or any other legal action of První vlaštovka, a social cooperative and is exclusively a legally non-binding information notice, even if not specifically marked so.
Results automatic: Results will change automatically according to the provided values.
Repayment type end: Both principal and interest at the end
Repayment type yearly: Interest paid yearly, principal at the end
Loan duration: Duration of the loan in years
Check if correct: Please check the values, before sending the proposal
Error try again: Something is wrong, please try again later
Summary interest type end: You will provide us with a loan in the amount of {{amount}} {{currency}}, which we will return to you after $t(Duration years, {"count": {{duration}} }) at the latest, including a yearly interest of {{interest}} % (simple interest rate). In total, we will return you {{total}} {{currency}}.
Summary interest type yearly: You will provide us with a loan in the amount of {{amount}} {{currency}}, which we will return to you after $t(Duration years, {"count": {{duration}} }) at the latest. We will repay you the interest of {{interest}} % (simple interest rate) yearly. In total, we will return you {{total}} {{currency}}.
Enter email if want to send: If you want to send a non-binding loan offer to the cooperative, please enter your email.
Thank you!: ✅ Thank you, your offer has been sent! ✅
In 24 hours: We will contact you at the specified email address within 24 hours.
